sentences.en: a woman’s menstrual cycle
sentences.cn: 女性的月经周期

sentences.en: Carmela heard the purr of a motor-cycle coming up the drive.
sentences.cn: 卡梅拉听到摩托车隆隆地开上了车道。

sentences.en: cycle routes
sentences.cn: 自行车路线

sentences.en: Do you cycle to work?
sentences.cn: 你骑自行车上班吗？

sentences.en: Each new product would have a relatively long life cycle.
sentences.cn: 每种新产品都将会有相对较长的生命周期。

sentences.en: Eddie parked his cycle against a lamp post and padlocked it.
sentences.cn: 埃迪把他的自行车靠在路灯柱上，用挂锁锁好。

sentences.en: He cycled to Ingwold.
sentences.cn: 他骑车去了英格沃尔德。

sentences.en: Her own preferred methods of exercise are hiking and long cycle rides.
sentences.cn: 她自己喜欢徒步旅行和骑自行车长途旅行这样的运动方式。

sentences.en: Not all doctors truly understand the reproductive cycle.
sentences.cn: 并非所有的医生都真正了解生殖周期。

sentences.en: Stefano used a motor cycle to herd the sheep.
sentences.cn: 斯特凡诺骑一辆摩托车放羊。

sentences.en: Such areas should also be served by dedicated cycle routes.
sentences.cn: 这些区域也应该设专门的自行车道。

sentences.en: The average length of a woman's menstrual cycle is 28 days.
sentences.cn: 妇女的平均月经周期是28天。

sentences.en: The cycle then repeats itself.
sentences.cn: 这个循环周而复始。

sentences.en: The figures marked the final low point of the present economic cycle.
sentences.cn: 这些数据显示了目前经济周期的最低点。

sentences.en: the life cycle of the butterfly
sentences.cn: 蝴蝶的生活周期

sentences.en: the seasonal cycle of death and rebirth
sentences.cn: 死而复生的四季轮回

sentences.en: The water is cycled through the machine and reused.
sentences.cn: 水通过机器循环后重复使用。

sentences.en: There are a multitude of small quiet roads to cycle along.
sentences.cn: 有很多可以骑车的宁静小路。

sentences.en: This cycle repeats itself ad infinitum.
sentences.cn: 该循环周而复始，永无止境。

sentences.en: We went for a cycle ride on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 我们星期天骑自行车去兜风了。

words.tran_cn: 骑脚踏车消遣；骑脚踏车兜风
循环；[车辆]骑自行车；轮转

phrases.tran_cn: 工作周期；占空度；忙闲度
n. 水文循环；水上脚踏车

trans.tran_cn: 自行车，摩托车，整套，循环，组诗
trans.tran_en: a number of related events that happen again and again in the same order

trans.tran_cn: 自行车、 摩托车； 循环
trans.tran_en: a number of related events that happen again and again in the same order
to go through a series of related events again and again, or to make something do this

trans.tran_cn: 骑自行车， 骑摩托车； 循环

trans.tran_en: to go through a series of related events again and again, or to make something do this
